name: HACEP
tagline: A Scalable, Highly Available, CEP Architecture
body:
### HACEP
HACEP is a Scalable and Highly Available architecture for [Drools](http://www.drools.org) Complex Event Processing.
HACEP combines [Infinispan](http://infinispan.org), [Camel](http://camel.apache.org), [ActiveMQ](http://activemq.apache.org) and obviously [Drools](http://www.drools.org) in a unique way to obtain:

* CEP Automatic horizontal scalability 
* CEP Automatic fail over

### Overview

An hi-level technical overview of HACEP can be found [here](http://redhat.slides.com/ulandini/hacep-1)
